questions.questionText: I would like to know about where you live. Talk about the different rooms at your place. Tell me about your favorite room in your home. What does it look like?
I would like to know where you live. Can you describe your home to me? What does it look like? How many rooms does it have? Give me a description with lots of details.
Now, let's talk about your bedroom. What's inside? What kind of furniture do you have in your room?
What kinds of home improvement projects do you enjoy doing and why?
Tell me about your normal routine at home. What do you do on weekdays and on weekends?
What is your normal routine at home? What things do you usually do on weekdays and on weekends?
What is your responsibility at home? What is your role? Tell me in detail.
What kinds of things do you do to keep your house clean and comfortable? What kinds of housework do you do at home?
What kind of house work do you usually do at home? Do you share your chores with your family?
Tell me about all the steps you take for a home improvement project. What steps do you usually take? How do you complete the project?
Tell me about a memorable experience you had at home. What happened and why was it memorable?
Have you ever had any problems at home? Maybe something broke or there was an issue with your neighbors. Tell me about that experience and how you solved it.
Tell me about a time when you had to do a major cleaning or organizing at home. What did you do and how did it turn out?
